  7. from filer.fields.folder import FilerFolderField
  8. from filer.models.imagemodels import Image
  11. class Gallery(models.Model):
  12. """
  13. Model to display a filer folder's contents and provide extra information.
  15. :title: Gallery title.
  16. :date: Date/Time of the gallery event.
  17. :location: Location of the gallery items.
  18. :description: Description of the gallery.
  19. :folder: Linked folder of the filer app.
  21. """
  22. category = models.ForeignKey(
  23. 'image_gallery.GalleryCategory',
  24. verbose_name=_('Category'),
  25. blank=True, null=True,
  26. )
  28. title = models.CharField(
  29. max_length=100,
  30. verbose_name=_('Title'),
  31. )
  33. date = models.DateTimeField(
  34. verbose_name=_('Date'),
  35. blank=True, null=True,
  36. )
  38. location = models.CharField(
  39. max_length=100,
  40. verbose_name=_('Location'),
  41. blank=True, null=True,
  42. )
  44. description = PlaceholderField(
  45. 'description',
  46. verbose_name=_('Description'),
  47. )
  49. folder = FilerFolderField(
  50. verbose_name=_('Folder'),
  51. )
  53. def __unicode__(self):
  54. return '{0}'.format(self.title)
  56. def get_folder_images(self):
  57. """Returns a set of images, which have been placed in this folder."""
  58. qs_files = self.folder.files.instance_of(Image)
  59. return qs_files.filter(is_public=True)
  62. class GalleryCategory(models.Model):
  63. """
  64. Is used to categorize galleries.
  66. :name: Then human readable name of the category.
  67. :slug: The slug of the category

  81. return self.name
  84. class GalleryPlugin(CMSPlugin):
  85. """Plugin model to link to a specific gallery instance."""
